itunes:title: Episode 732 -California Is Completely SHUTDOWN
title: Episode 732 -California Is Completely SHUTDOWN
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the California shutdown, Matthew McConaughey getting in trouble for saying Hollywood liberals are condescending to the rest of the country, Dan announces the Drinkin’ Bros 2020 Christmas Charity, Ross explains why ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the California shutdown, Matthew McConaughey getting in trouble for saying Hollywood liberals are condescending to the rest of the country, Dan announces the Drinkin’ Bros 2020 Christmas Charity, Ross explains why the music industry is screwed and breaks down why Bob Dylan sold his catalog for $300 mil, plus a female boxer beat her husband to death and Tom Brady’s stalker shows up in his house.
